game.s_dis: Granny 2: Chapter Two is a first-person horror escape game where players must survive and escape a house guarded by Granny and Grandpa, each with unique dangers.
game.l_dis:
Play Granny 2 Unblocked – Chapter Two Horror Escape Game

Granny 2 (also known as Granny: Chapter Two) continues the terrifying survival horror experience where you must escape a deadly house while evading two relentless pursuers—Granny and Grandpa. Granny hears every sound you make, while Grandpa is slower but armed with a shotgun. You have five days to solve puzzles, unlock escape routes, and survive their deadly pursuit.

What is Granny 2?

In Granny 2, you wake up trapped in another horrifying house filled with locked doors, hidden items, and lurking dangers. Granny’s sharp hearing and Grandpa’s heavy footsteps make every move risky. Each day that passes brings more tension, as you must quietly search for keys, tools, and clues to make your escape before time runs out.

How to Play Granny 2

  • Move Carefully: Walk or crouch to stay quiet and avoid alerting Granny.
  • Watch Out for Grandpa: He carries a shotgun and reacts fast if he sees you.
  • Search for Items: Find keys, weapons, and tools to unlock escape routes.
  • Hide When Necessary: Use wardrobes, under beds, or dark corners to hide.
  • Survive Five Days: You have five in-game days to escape or face the consequences.

Why Play Granny 2 Unblocked?

Play Granny 2: Chapter Two unblocked online and experience the ultimate horror challenge right from your browser. No downloads or installations are needed—just pure survival horror gameplay. Outsmart Granny and Grandpa in this terrifying sequel that tests your patience, reflexes, and strategy.

Key Features

  • Dual Enemies: Face both Granny’s speed and Grandpa’s shotgun accuracy.
  • Interactive Environment: Unlock doors, hide, and explore to survive.
  • Increased Difficulty: New rooms, traps, and puzzles to solve.
  • Weapon Options: Find and use limited weapons to temporarily disable enemies.
  • Unblocked Gameplay: Play anywhere, anytime, without restrictions.

Escape Before It’s Too Late!

Granny 2: Chapter Two raises the stakes with two terrifying enemies and a larger house to explore. Stay quiet, plan your moves, and survive long enough to escape the nightmare. Will you outsmart Granny and Grandpa, or fall victim to their deadly home?
